Html:
Hi,

Will the wpf datagrid support readonly columns in the next release?  Currently I can achieve readonly columns by using a template column, but then I lose the sorting capabilities.

Thank much,
Jon
ReadOnly columns will be supported in v1.  Also, you can still sort with a template column through SortMemberPath.  Have you tried that or is there another requirement that is blocking that?

Thanks Vin - Let me try the SortMemberPath, I was unaware of this.

Thanks,
Jon
